amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 38 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1997, printed as amendment No. 38 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1997, to cut development assistance to India by $14.5 million, to $41.8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 82 - 342 (Roll no. 356).
